content: Are you guys mainly US or EU based?
awesome, i saw your ad in the starbase dc, are you guys recruiting still?
great stuff, i have a couple of friends, ill talk it over with them

thats great! i applied 🙂 i would like to bring some friends along but ill discuss that when my ticket will be handled i suppose
so you can't take peoples ships? what do you do with them when you run into one, deconstruct it and take parts?
looking good <@!261972352470876160>  are those the faction colours are they ? 🙂
cant wait to go out hunting 🙂
do those mining lasers have a degree of turret depression? or can they aim only upwards
